name: Helping Friends
description:
A simple match 3 game. On the bottom panel, slide items around to line up three or more of the same items horizontally or vertically to make a match. Matches of the same type of the friend first in line (or a match of hearts!) cheer up your friend. Cure as many friends of their sadness within the time limit!

Made after a very long hiatus for Godot Wild Jam #50 with theme Ritual and wildcard Animism.
